meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1667.

td.p: Steve Greenfogel, an attorney from Cherry Hill, New Jersey
Kerry Turk, a defense analyst from San Antonio, Texas
Kirk Ditzler, a teacher from Houston, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,600)

tr.td: THE HUMAN BODY
IOWA
BIRDS
FOREIGN CURRENCY
MIDDLE NAMES
"HOUSE"s
